title: Career Decline Isn't Inevitable
description: As we age, we often feel like the clock starts ticking on our careers. But there are ways to sustain—and even gain—excellence over time. Meet a musician whose career ended too soon, and an entrepreneur and a social media star who defied the stereotypes on professional decline. They illuminate steps that fuel great second and third acts.
itunes:subtitle: As we age, we often feel like the clock starts ticking on our careers
author: podcasts@ted.com (TED)
itunes:author: TED
